channel.title: EPA on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in EPA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: EPA plans to ignore science, stop regulating greenhouse gases
item.description: “Largest deregulatory action” in the history of US would be one of the unhealthiest.

item.title: Win for chemical industry as EPA shutters scientific research office
item.description: Companies feared rules and lawsuits based on Office of Research and Development assessments.

item.title: EPA Employees Still in the Dark as Agency Dismantles Scientific Research Office
item.description: As the EPA moves to shut down the Office of Research and Development, leadership is unable to answer questions as basic as when it will close and how many will lose their jobs.

item.title: EPA Employees Still in the Dark as Agency Dismantles Scientific Research Office
